long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kepicker: Find the Most Profitable Products to Sell on Amazon!

🌟 Kepicker - The Ultimate Amazon Product Research Tool 🌟

🚀 Boost Your Amazon Sales with Kepicker! 🚀

Unlock the full potential of your Amazon selling experience with Kepicker, the ultimate Chrome extension designed specifically for Amazon sellers who are serious about skyrocketing their profits. Whether you're a newbie or a seasoned seller, Kepicker is your go-to tool for gaining a competitive edge!



🔍 Kepicker Core Tools:

	ASIN Extractor 📋: 
	Instantly grab all ASINs from the current page with a single click. Save time and streamline your workflow! Pull all Asins embedded on any Amazon page in seconds.

	ASIN SPY 🕵‍♂: 
	Automatically collect all ASINs from a seller's page. Stay ahead of the competition by monitoring other sellers' strategies.

	Marketplace Comparison 📊: 
	Compare products across different Amazon marketplaces to pinpoint the most profitable opportunities. Make smarter buying and selling decisions!

	Product-Based Info 🤖: 
	Access ROI calculations and price information directly on the product page. Maximize your profits with real-time data! The extension calculates critical financial indicators such as ROI, profit, expenses, and sales ranking. Users can utilize this information to maximize potential profits and minimize risks. It also keeps the data on product pages continuously updated, ensuring users have access to the most current information.

	Uploader Tool 🔄: 
	Easily upload and compare lists of ASINs. Perfect for bulk analysis and strategic planning.

	Kepicker Calculator 📈: 
	Make your own calculations by manually entering the source and target market price and shipping price.

	Powerful Stock Fetcher 📦:
	Get detailed stock data to ensure you never run out of your best sellers. Find out the stock numbers (FBA, FBM, AMZ) and the number of sellers associated with each stock. 💪 Migrated to Manifest V3.

	Historical Keepa Data 📚: 
	View comprehensive historical Keepa data to predict future trends and pricing strategies.



📑 Kepicker Main Features:
	✔ Powerful ASIN Grabber
	✔ Advanced Stock Fetcher
	✔ Storefront Data
	✔ Auto / Manual ROI Calculation
	✔ Compare All Amazon Marketplaces 
	✔ Historical Product Data 
	✔ Google Sheets Integration
	✔ Telegram Integration
	✔ Product's Monthly Sales Count
	✔ Amazon Best Sellers Rank (BSR)
	✔ Currency Converter
	✔ Custom Shipping Settings for FBM
	✔ ASIN - EAN - UPC Infos
	✔ Barcode UPC Lookup
	✔ Search the Product on Google
	✔ Check the Product on Amazon Seller Central
	✔ Product Variation Informations
	✔ Product Hazmat Information
	✔ Heat Sensitive - Meltable Information
	✔ Find Competing Sellers of the Products
	✔ Business Prime Discounts
	✔ Web Based Asin 360° Tool
	✔ Favorites or Following Lists
	✔ Dimensional Measurement
	✔ Merge Asin Lists
	✔ and many more features... You can visit our website for all detailed information.



🌐 Global Reach, Local Insight:
Kepicker offers tools that leverage global data while providing insights tailored to your specific market needs. Whether you're selling in the U.S., Europe, or Asia, Kepicker has you covered!



💡 Why Choose Kepicker?
	Fast and Reliable: 
	Designed for efficiency, our tools deliver results quickly and accurately.

	User-Friendly Interface: 
	Easy to navigate and use, regardless of your tech skills.

	Data-Driven Decisions: 
	Empower your business decisions with robust data analytics.

	Multi-Language: 
	Kepicker has multiple languages: Türkçe, English, Deutsch..
	
	Dedicated Support with Ticketing System: 
	Have a question or need help? Our dedicated support team is just a ticket away. Submit your inquiries and get personalized assistance to ensure your experience is smooth and productive.




🌟 Get Started Today! 🌟
Download Kepicker now and transform your Amazon selling journey! With our cutting-edge tools, you're not just selling; you're dominating the marketplace!
